definition: classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc
grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)
fine particle (PM 2.5)/fine particulate matter (air pollution etc)
not a single grain was reaped (as in a bad harvest year)

sentences.english: Objective To study the preventive and therapeutic effects of Migu granule on osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究密骨顆粒對骨質疏鬆症的防治作用。

sentences.english: In male flowers, style cells containing no calcium precipitation soon began to degenerate.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏鈣沉澱顆粒的雄花花柱細胞迅速解體。

sentences.english: Calcium precipitates in style cell and vascular tissues of male flowers was sparse and seldom seen.
sentences.chinese: 雄花花柱細胞和維管細胞中鈣沉澱顆粒很少。

sentences.english: Suitable for packing materials with fine flowability.
sentences.chinese: 適用於流動性好的顆粒料的包裝。

sentences.english: Inhalable particulate matters(IP)bring adverse influence on ambient air and human health.
sentences.chinese: 可吸入顆粒物嚴重影響空氣質量和人體健康。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an apparatus using ultrasonic to atomize liquids to tiny particles.
sentences.chinese: 一種利用超聲波將液體霧化爲微小顆粒的裝置。

sentences.english: The gall bladder stores and discharges the bile, which helps to break down fats into minute droplets.
sentences.chinese: 膽囊儲存和釋放膽汁，協助脂肪分解爲微小的顆粒。

sentences.english: Use the stream strategy to support the granularity of distribution being undertaken.
sentences.chinese: 使用流策略支持發佈的顆粒度。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a qualitative standard of Shehua granules .
sentences.chinese: 目的建立蛇花顆粒製劑的質量標準。

sentences.english: Small drops of glass can be used instead of jewels in many electric instruments.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃顆粒可代替寶石軸承安裝在電器儀表內。

sentences.english: This is because the palladium nanoparticles continued to release trapped electrons.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲鈀納米顆粒在不斷地釋放捕獲的電子。

sentences.english: But water infusion may cause the charging structure displacing or escaping.
sentences.chinese: 固體顆粒封孔的裝藥結構頻繁發生炮孔堵塞。

sentences.english: The research aimed to establish a method for the determination of paeoniflor in Jianganle particle by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 建立健肝樂顆粒中芍藥苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: The wooden fish stone granules in the casing can be regularly replaced.
sentences.chinese: 殼體中的木魚石顆粒可定期更換。

sentences.english: Secondly, carbon fiber coated nano-tin oxide particles to provide high capacity.
sentences.chinese: 二是在碳纖維表面包覆納米氧化錫顆粒，提供高容量。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for determination of the total flavonoids contents in Complex Prescription Kudouzi Granules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定複方苦豆子顆粒中總生黃酮含量的方法。
